name: Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion
description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Pyro DMG. If Eremite Scorching Loremaster has already used a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill, this DMG is increased by 1.
Usage(s): 2

When entering play, when the Action Phase starts: Attach Pyro Scorpion: Guardian Stance to your Eremite Scorching Loremaster. (Twice per Round when Spirit of Omen: Pyro Scorpion is in play, it will cause the character to take -1 DMG.)
